title: Gronk Retires... Again
description:
Ndamukong Suh joins Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew to discuss Rob Gronkowski’s retirement, Deshaun Watson’s attorney’s statement on settlements, if Lamar Jackson should be at camp, and Ndamukong names his 5 favorite QBs to sack. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Gronk announces his retirement and Ndamukong Suh's favorite QBs to sack.
